name: Ginkgo MullenLowe
tagline: Balance between strategy, culture and passion.
description:
Ginkgo MullenLowe. One of the most creative agencies in the most effective network in the world.
Created in 1976, member of the MullenLowe Group network. Unique Uruguayan among the 30 best agencies in Latin America at Cannes Lions 2014. Ranked in the Top 5 agencies of the most effective network in the world, according to Effie Awards ranking.
At Ginkgo we believe that advertising needs good ideas, that these ideas generate good ads and that good ads sell more.
